amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate regarding legislation to impose an excise tax on tobacco lawyer's fees that exceed $20,000 per hour in order to increase funding for equipment for the United States Armed Forces.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3191 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 37 - 62. Record Vote Number: 100.

action.text: Amendment SA 3191 proposed by Senator Kyl.

Amendment 3191 was modified to reflect a first degree amendment by Unanimous Consent. (text as modified: CR S5767) To express the sense of the Senate regarding legislation to impose an excise tax on tobacco lawyer's fees that exceed $20,000 per hour in order to increase funding for equipment for the United States Armed Forces.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3191 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 37 - 62. Record Vote Number: 100.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3191 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 37 - 62. Record Vote Number: 100.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3191 proposed by Senator Kyl.
